duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with HRBP’s and leadership to understand business needs and provide recommendations on compensation matters.
Evaluate market and economic trends to recommend adjustments to the company’s compensation programs.
Review requests for new or revised roles to determine appropriate salary grade assignments within the job architecture.
Lead the planning of administration of base pay, incentive programs, and executive compensation processes.
Stay abreast of employment law updates and ensure compliance with federal, state, and local laws and regulations.
Develop communication and training materials geared toward HR and line manager development.
Interface with global counterparts to align regional compensation programs to global reward principles.
Perform other reward-related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience required. Master's degree preferred.
